item.title: Rust - from 0 to productive in 2 weeks
item.description: This is a story of me going from making sarcastic jokes about rewriting everything in Rust to becoming one of them growing to like the language.

item.title: Compiling a Rust library to wasm
item.description: Since finding Paul Masurel’s tantivy searching/indexing library, I thought it would be cool to make the library available for the browser.
